snippet: Michael Albasini of Switzerland won a second stage shortened by snow at the Tour of Romandie in Switzerland, and Michal Kwiatkowski of Poland retained the overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Michael Albasini of Switzerland won a second stage shortened by snow at the Tour of Romandie in Switzerland, and Michal Kwiatkowski of Poland retained the overall lead.

headline.main: Swiss Wins Tour of Romandie Stage
headline.print_headline: Swiss Wins Tour of Romandie Stage
